name: The Furrys
description:
MEET THE FURRYS

Little chaps who just want to get home, can you help them find the way ?

Simply draw a line to direct the flow of Furrys to home.


FEATURES
● Guide The Furrys to home via your finger.
● Unlock new levels when getting your Furrys home.
● 18 Astounding Furry Levels to solve.
